title: 5 key questions to ask before you start your Power BI project
excerpt: At the beginning of each Power BI project I always ask this 5 questions to make sure I am on track already from the beginning.  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center  SUBSCRIBE to learn more about Power and Excel BI! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJ7UhloHSA4wAqPzyi6TOkw?sub_confirmation=1
